fullText:
Eldeen Companion

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Shifter, ranger, Beast Mastery class feature
Benefit: Whenever you use your longtooth shifting or razorclaw shifting racial power, your beast companion also gains the benefit of the power’s effect.

Published in Eberron Player's Guide, page(s) 90.
name: Eldeen Companion
prerequisite: Shifter, ranger, Beast Mastery class feature
benefit: Whenever you use your longtooth shifting or razorclaw shifting racial power, your beast companion also gains the benefit of the power’s effect.
